/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is beautifully lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A black car can be seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
